author: donaldp
msg: Add the ability for a Block to request that its enclosing application
This may in turn shutdown the kernel if it no longer contains any applications and it has not been made persistent.

author: donaldp
msg: Update i18n library so that it has the method to dump the cache of resources on request.
Update the Deployer to dump resource cache so that reloaded applications will reload the resources aswell.

author: donaldp
msg: Add a method to clear the whole cahce. Protect it with a runtime permission.
